name: Noxtton
description:
Noxtton is the first Georgian multi-dimensional tech and consulting company, whose primary target market is an international domain. The focus of Noxtton generalises on the business corporations, governmental and non- governmental sectors and start-ups.
 
Noxtton provides a wide assortment of digital services including, but not limited to; Tech consulting, Cyber Security Services, Software Development, Website Development and Design, Digital Branding, E-commerce, Mobile and Web Application Development, ERP & CRM System Development and Integrations, AI Research and BOT Development, with addition to Blockchain and Digital Marketing services.
 
Noxtton specialises in crafting a smart, trendy and intelligent organisational and digital strategies in order to deliver exceptional user experiences, sales conversions and strong digital presence for the stakeholders. Noxtton’s team invests a substantial amount of time understanding clients’ benchmarks of success, key unique- selling propositions, KPI’s and crafts smart digital strategies to gain paramount market share in the digital universe.
